crypto

Class RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • crypto.RSA

  • public class RSA
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods to encrypt data via variable keylength RSA.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RSA() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigInteger decrypt(java.math.BigInteger msg)
      Decrypt a message using the set private key.
      static java.math.BigInteger decrypt(java.math.BigInteger msg, java.math.BigInteger[] privateKey)
      Decrypt a message using the given private key.
      static java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.math.BigInteger msg, java.math.BigInteger[] publicKey)
      Encrypt a message using the given public key.
      java.math.BigInteger[][] generateKeyPairs(int bits)
      Generates a new set of RSA keypairs using the given bitlength.
      java.math.BigInteger genPrime(int bits)
      Generate a large prime number with the given bitlength.
      java.math.BigInteger[] getPrivateKey()
      Get the RSA private key as an array containing [n, d].
      java.math.BigInteger[] getPublicKey()
      Get the RSA public key as an array containing [n, e].

    • Method Detail

      • getPrivateKey

        public java.math.BigInteger[] getPrivateKey()
        Get the RSA private key as an array containing [n, d].
        Returns:
        The private key as a two-element BigIntegerArray formatted as [n, d].

      • getPublicKey

        public java.math.BigInteger[] getPublicKey()
        Get the RSA public key as an array containing [n, e].
        Returns:
        The public key as a two-element BigIntegerArray formatted as [n, e].

      • generateKeyPairs

        public java.math.BigInteger[][] generateKeyPairs(int bits)
        Generates a new set of RSA keypairs using the given bitlength.
        Parameters:
        bits - The bitlength of the keys. For instance, 1024, 2048, 4096, etc.
        Returns:
        A pair of keys in a multidimensional array formatted as [Public key, Private key] where Public: [n, e] and Private: [n, d].

      • genPrime

        public java.math.BigInteger genPrime(int bits)
        Generate a large prime number with the given bitlength.
        Parameters:
        bits - The bitlength to generate.
        Returns:
        The generated prime as a BigInteger.

      • encrypt

        public static java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.math.BigInteger msg,
                                           java.math.BigInteger[] publicKey)
        Encrypt a message using the given public key.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to encrypt, formatted as a BigInteger.
        publicKey - The public key to use, formatted as [n, e].
        Returns:
        The encrypted message.

      • decrypt

        public static java.math.BigInteger decrypt(java.math.BigInteger msg,
                                           java.math.BigInteger[] privateKey)
        Decrypt a message using the given private key.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to decrypt, formatted as a BigInteger.
        privateKey - The private key to use, formatted as [n, d].
        Returns:
        The decrypted message.

      • decrypt

        public java.math.BigInteger decrypt(java.math.BigInteger msg)
        Decrypt a message using the set private key.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to decrypt, formatted as a BigInteger.
        Returns:
        The decrypted message.
